import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBIcon, MDBCardHeader, MDBBtn, MDBInput, MDBSelect, } from "mdbreact"; const axios = require("axios"); class InsertProductForm extends Component { state = { productName: "", categoryName: "", productBrand: "", productModel: "", productCode: "", productQuantity: "", productSize: "", productColor: "", productPurchasePrice: "", productRetailPrice: "", productDiscountPrice: "", productStatus: "", options: [ { text: "USA", value: "1", }, { text: "Germany", value: "2", }, { text: "France", value: "3", }, { text: "Poland", value: "4", }, { text: "Japan", value: "5", }, ], }; componentDidMount = () => { let categories = []; axios .post("http://localhost/spare_parts/show_category.php") .then((response) => { categories = response.data; console.log(categories); categories.map((cat) => console.log(cat)); }); }; onAdd = () => { const { onAdd } = this.props; const { productName, categoryName, productBrand, productColor, productSize, productPurchasePrice, productCode, productDiscountPrice, productModel, productQuantity, productRetailPrice, productStatus, } = this.state; let product = { productName: productName, categoryName: categoryName, productBrand: productBrand, productModel: productModel, productCode: productCode, productQuantity: productQuantity, productSize: productSize, productColor: productColor, productPurchasePrice: productPurchasePrice, productRetailPrice: productRetailPrice, productDiscountPrice: productDiscountPrice, productStatus: productStatus, }; onAdd(product); }; render() { return (

Insert Product

{/*---------- Row 1 ----------*/} this.setState({ productName: event.target.value }) } name="productName" /> {/* TODO: Convert into MDBSelect */} this.setState({ categoryName: val, }) } label="Example label" onChange={(event) => this.setState({ categoryName: event.target.value, }) } /> this.setState({ productBrand: event.target.value, }) } name="productBrand" /> {/*---------- Row 2 ----------*/} this.setState({ productModel: event.target.value, }) } name="productModel" /> this.setState({ productCode: event.target.value, }) } name="productCode" /> this.setState({ productQuantity: event.target.value, }) } name="productQuantity" /> {/*---------- Row 3 ----------*/} this.setState({ productSize: event.target.value, }) } name="productSize" /> this.setState({ productColor: event.target.value, }) } name="productColor" /> this.setState({ productPurchasePrice: event.target.value, }) } name="productPurchasePrice" /> {/*---------- Row 4 ----------*/} this.setState({ productRetailPrice: event.target.value, }) } name="productRetailPrice" /> this.setState({ productDiscountPrice: event.target.value, }) } name="productDiscountPrice" /> this.setState({ productStatus: event.target.value, }) } name="productStatus" />

); } } export default InsertProductForm;
